content: 4 Accounts Connected: MymunaMijanur365SvshsSiyam37Quote from: Mymuna on February 22, 2023, 07:14:34 AM1. comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Since some accounts are evading bans, you can report them in this thread as well. Additional related accounts have already been reported by CryptoYar here.

comments.author: John Abraham
comments.body: Oh, Now, typical bounty hunters become bounty managers as well? I am curious how they did it while there are a lot of reputed bounty managers waiting for jobs, and there is a lot of competition as well. I believe those projects are scams who doesn't care about reputations. Having multiple accounts is not bad if they do not violate any rules and don't cheat. I didn't find one of them cheating on campaigns. But, since they broke the ban evading rules, You may report them for ban evading.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.body: Quote from: John Abraham on February 23, 2023, 06:16:35 AMOh, Now, typical bounty hunters become bounty managers as well? I am curious how they did it while there are a lot of reputed bounty managers waiting for jobs, and there is a lot of competition as well. I believe those projects are scams who doesn't care about reputations. Having multiple accounts is not bad if they do not violate any rules and don't cheat. I didn't find one of them cheating on campaigns. But, since they broke the ban evading rules, You may report them for ban evading. more bounty hunters won't mind that. bounty managers with bad reputations or even obvious scam projects, but they still register for campaigns. and they should know, they will get nothing.If you visit the bounty board, you will see some new bounty managers with new accounts or accounts with old registrations but wake up. I don't know what happened, but I guess that they deliberately made a fake project and made their campaign.

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: John Abraham on February 23, 2023, 06:16:35 AMOh, Now, typical bounty hunters become bounty managers as well?I think they are the one who will do better job. They know the industry more than the high rank members like us. They are working in the field and the work makes them experience which makes it easier to negotiate but it will be always better for project manager to hire a reputable member when they are sending their token or any coin that is in their budget for the campaign. Manager manage the campaign and escrow takes care of the payment.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Unfortunately, the projects that are published in the Bounty campaigns do not care much about the good reputation. They are interested in publishing their project in the forum in any way, so they do not care much about searching for members with a high rank and reputation in the forum.Also, most of those who participate in Bounty campaigns are newbies who do not care much about the reputation of the project, what matters to them is getting some tokens from the project and selling them as soon as possible.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on February 26, 2023, 05:36:29 PMUnfortunately, the projects that are published in the Bounty campaigns do not care much about the good reputation. They are interested in publishing their project in the forum in any way, so they do not care much about searching for members with a high rank and reputation in the forum.Also, most of those who participate in Bounty campaigns are newbies who do not care much about the reputation of the project, what matters to them is getting some tokens from the project and selling them as soon as possible.Because if they hire a reputed manager, they have to pay a big fee. But using such low reputation accounts, when they launch bounties in this way, they do the work by paying them low fees. So these projects always want to run their bounty campaign in this forum at low cost, so instead of professional work they get many cheaters who do different types of fraud in their campaign.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: So, the campaign manager is also abusing the bounty campaign! What else should we have to see? Ridiculous though this is not the first time here if I'm correct. Quote from: yhiaali3 on February 26, 2023, 05:36:29 PMUnfortunately, the projects that are published in the Bounty campaigns do not care much about the good reputation. They are interested in publishing their project in the forum in any way, so they do not care much about searching for members with a high rank and reputation in the forum.Because of the fee. A few weeks back, I was contacted by a project to run their bounty campaign here. When I sent them pricing, they asked me whether I can accept their token as payment lol. I said no and guess what, the next day I found they hired a Jr Member camp[aign manager. You cxan hire such campaign manager with your iwn token and a lot of projects are happy with paying no money lol.
